text: Manly is a suburb of Auckland and is located in the Whangaparaoa Peninsula. It has a primary school, an established shopping center and residential areas of Big Manly Beach in the north and Little Manly Beach in the south. It was once a seaside holiday location until it became within commuting distance of Auckland City. ==References== Category:Suburbs of Auckland Category:Hibiscus and Bays Local Board Area
title: Manly, New Zealand
